message: Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm feeling generous today.
Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair deal!
I'm willing to be a little more reasonable this time, Bob.  Take it while you can, because the money is going to start shrinking even faster.
I'll give you a quarter of the money, but I think I deserve more
Bob, this is my final offer. If you reject it, I'm confident I can get a better deal from someone else.
I'll give you the whole thing, but only if you agree to pay me a 1% commission on all future deals
